name: Drill Tank
description:
This is my first time participating in a game jam, so I hope you guys enjoy it!

This is a simple 2D shooter made for ZenoJam 3.

In this game, you play as a drill tank. You can chose whether to shoot the enemy down from the distance or crush them to pieces with your drill!

Your goal is to eliminate the enemy as much as you can.

Move: W,A,S,D / arrows

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Toggle Shoot: E

Dash: Space / Right Mouse Button

Pause: Escape

Dash can damage enemy

Kill enemy with dash to heal

PS. This game has no audio, so don't worry if you don't hear anything.
